titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Northlake, Texas.
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Northlake, Texas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Northlake, Texas.
